Name: Piggy Wiggle Butt
Condition Immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
Traits: Aggressive. As a bonus action, Piggy Wiggle Butt can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
Actions: Clay Jug. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
